DOC.detailed_description: The objective proposal base assumption HIV infect Ethiopian population respond different way comparison Caucasian subject Lopinavir therapy . Our preliminary data demonstrate Ethiopian 's different Lopinavir serum concentration comparison non-Ethiopian 's . For reason plan study investigate pharmacokinetic/pharmacodynamic ( PK/PD ) profile population . The result allow establish good personalised medicine HIV infect individual .
